title: Introducing: Twin Caverns
content:
Photo: Reginald Smith
Australia keeps killing.

Syndey based duo Twin Caverns, comprised of Louise Millar and Michael Macias first appeared on our radar with their magical reworked ‘cover’ of Bon Iver’s Hinnom, TX, a rather ambitious debut first outing. Now, with two tracks of their own, the latest being the simply stunning Undiscover, a sort of London Grammar meets The XX style number, they’re truly ready to take 2014 by storm. With rapidly increasing success on Australia’s Triple J Unearthed (coincidently where we first heard them), and their live shows kicking into gear, they’re undoubtedly one to keep an eye out for in the near future. Check all three tracks below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
